verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy is the God of Israel
Elders bow in worship as the angel voices swell
Fragrant clouds of incense swirl around Your throne of grace
Lord we bow in worship at the brilliance of Your face. We cry

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy is the Lord
Holy Holy Holy is the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy is the song that Heaven sings
All creation praise Him Hallelujah Elohim
Come to reign forever King of kings and Lord of lords
Lift your head O Zion open wide you ancient doors And cry
